node.title: Care Packages complete, MP Shaun Chen honours Blankets for T.O.

childMarkdownRemark.html: During the Blankets for T.O. Care Package Event we gathered essential items to create personalized Care Package bags and donated them to local shelters. We also received a visit and a certificate from Member of Parliament Shaun Chen!

imagePreview.description: Poster image for the Blankets for T.O. Care Package Event, during March 2021.

node.title: Water.org UTSC x BTO Winter/Holiday Event

childMarkdownRemark.html: We collaborate with Water.org UTSC to provide students with opportunities to socialize with friends, win prizes in games and raffles, and become better informed about homelessness in Toronto and water scarcity around the world.

imagePreview.description: Blankets for TO Logo with snow background

childMarkdownRemark.html: In November 2020, still amid the COVID-19 Pandemic, BTO engaged in a donut distribution initiative while also helping to promote a local small business on campus.

imagePreview.description: A split image of our events in November 2020; Nasir's Hot Dog Stand promotion and our donut distribution initiative.
